title: Bye Bye George
author: JGray
text:
George, we hardly knew ye.

George is the name I gave our multi-species creation that sprung up from the blood of the King of Cups. Gennifer's bittersweet to see him go. Sure, George is awesome, but he was also a pain in the butt to draw and color!

Just a few more days for the contest! If you're going to submit an entry please do so now!

replies.author: *Guest*
replies.text: Oh George, I hardly knew ye :'(
